Articles.Content:
(If the picture if to big click this link)

I've created a small truck with mediocre cargo capacity.

Just for fun.

Serves no real purpose and is just there because i wanted to do a mountain mission.

Mods you can see in picture:

rbray89's EvironmentalVisualEnhancements.

Thesonicgalaxy's Better Atmospheres. (A pack for EVE)

shaw's TextureReplacer.

shaw's Extension of Sylith's Kerbal Heads.

If you want to have it here's the download.

Download MCP.

Manual:

1. EVA the verbal and make him board the seat.

2. Stage. This will get rid of the command pod(well... More or less...).

3. Load up the Mountain Climber Cargo Probe and dock it to the docking port(This is fairly hard).

4. Drive somewhere, and when you're ready stage again for the ramp to come off.

I hope you'll enjoy!
Great cabling and look too! Maybe slightly too tight for offroad and mountains climb use though (tire will probably break at some point)
Downloading now, will be real fun to try
I am thinking this looks like a sound concept which I am sure the OP has already tested. The rover rat in me can only say ... "Mmmmm dat wheel base."
